text: "Here Comes Santa Claus" is an American Christmas song recorded by Gene Autry. It was recorded in 1947 and 1953 on Columbia Records, both through Autry. Elvis Presley covered this song during 1957. Other musicians who recorded Here Comes Santa Claus include Doris Day, The Andrews Sisters and the Ray Conniff Singers. == References == Category:1947 songs Category:Christmas songs Category:Elvis Presley songs Category:The Andrews Sisters songs Category:Bing Crosby songs Category:Willie Nelson songs Category:Glen Campbell songs Category:Billy Idol songs Category:Bob Dylan songs Category:Chicago (band) songs Category:Mariah Carey songs
title: Here Comes Santa Claus
